desc: Le Olive is a brand that creates personalized Sleep- & Loungewear items. With much care we add our embroidery on Robes, Kimonos, Pajamas, Towels, Slippers and Leather goods. All embroidery colors can be chosen by our customers as well as the name or initials they would like to add on. It's the perfect personalized gift

layout.text: Wear it ! Show it ! Love it !
